references.paper_title: A theory of learning from different domains
references.reason: This paper lays the theoretical foundation for domain adaptation, a crucial concept in the field of domain adaptive object detection.

references.paper_title: Cascade R-CNN: Delving into high quality object detection
references.reason: This paper introduces Cascade R-CNN, a highly influential object detection model that serves as a baseline for many domain adaptive object detection methods.
This paper presents DETR, a novel transformer-based object detection model that significantly impacts the field by eliminating the need for hand-designed components.

references.paper_title: Domain adaptive faster R-CNN for object detection in the wild
references.reason: This is a foundational paper on domain adaptive object detection, introducing an adversarial training approach to address domain shift problems.

references.paper_title: Unbiased mean teacher for cross-domain object detection
references.reason: This work significantly contributes to semi-supervised domain adaptation by improving the accuracy of pseudo-labels generation and reducing the bias towards the source domain.
